title: My Caribbean Grandma
features: What do you remember about your grandma? Let My Caribbean Grandma transport you on a delightful journey through the life of people in rural Jamaica. Let’s take a trip down memory lane as this book jogs your memory and helps you relive the special things you shared with your grandma. Be inspired by My Caribbean Grandma and follow her on a cultural journey from the rural hills of Jamaica, to the big city market to sell her wares.
description: Sandra Campbell-Notice is an educator, nature lover and writer. Her first children's book My Caribbean Grandma is a tribute to her maternal grandmother whom she lived with as a young child. She currently lives in Southern California with her family. When not spending time with her family, Sandra reads, continues to be inspired by nature, and writes children's books.
